alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:26PM CDT until July 23 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN OZAUKEE AND SOUTHERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 1126 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Port Washington to Germantown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Bend, Mequon, Hartford, Grafton, Cedarburg, Port Washington, Jackson, Slinger, Saukville, Thiensville, Germantown, Newburg, Richfield, Holy Hill, Kirchhayn, Keowns and Hubertus. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
